  • Constructor Details

    • Driver

      public Driver()

  • Method Details

    • do_part1

      public static void do_part1(String fileNamemanifestFileName)
      Processes part 1 of movie data. Reads the part 1 manifest file, validates movie records, categorizes movies by genre, and writes bad movie records to a file.
      Parameters:
      manifestFileName - The name of the part 1 manifest file.

    • do_part2

      public static void do_part2(String fileNamemanifestFileName)
      Processes part 2 of movie data. Reads part 2 manifest file, loads movies from CSV files, serializes movie data into binary files, and writes file names to part 3 manifest file.
      Parameters:
      manifestFileName - The name of the part 2 manifest file.

    • do_part3

      public static void do_part3()
      Processes part 3 of movie data. Reads part 3 manifest file, deserialize movie data from binary files, and populates the all_movies array.

    • Menu

      public static void Menu()
      Displays the main menu and handles user navigation through movie genres.

    • loadMovies

      public static Movie[] loadMovies(String csvFileName)
      Loads movies from a CSV file into an array of Movie objects.
      Parameters:
      csvFileName - The name of the CSV file containing movie records.
      Returns:
      An array of Movie objects parsed from the CSV file.

    • Count

      public static int Count(String FileName)
      Counts the number of records in a file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to count records.
      Returns:
      The number of records in the file.

    • getGenreIndex

      public static int getGenreIndex(String genre)
      Retrieves the index of a genre in the genres array.
      Parameters:
      genre - The genre to find the index of.
      Returns:
      The index of the genre in the genres array, or -1 if not found.

    • getGenreFileName

      public static String getGenreFileName(int index)
      Generates the file name for a given genre.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the genre in the genres array.
      Returns:
      The file name corresponding to the genre.

    • display

      public static void display(Scanner scanner)
      Displays content (reads) from a scanner object.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner containing content to display.

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      SemanticErrors.InvalidPart - If the year is not within the valid range.

      Throws:

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method of the program. Executes part 1, part 2, part 3 processing, and displays the main menu.
